channel.title: Do you have a pure account?
channel.description:
I was wondering how many here has a pure account. And please if you dont play runescape dont post or vote.
I have a lvl 58 pure ranger with ranged lvl 79

*Edit: He’s 5 combat with 18 prayer. But I’m feeling like having fun so I’ll get him to like 25. Any takers? The first person to PM me gets him free.

item.title: Do you have a pure account?
item.dc:creator: @John2.0 John2.0
item.description:
@John2.0 wrote:

[quote=“Nashiu, post:22, topic:499”]Oh, in RS2 you can raise magic without raising 1 exp in hitpoints. I made a mage that was 67 magic with 10 hp and 1 everything else.
What you do is do the witch’s potion quest to get up a few lvls without raising hp, then you use confuse and that set of spells until you can low alch. Then you low alch until you can high alch. You can either do alchemy or teleporting, I used alchemy. I wouldn’t advise it though, I got 1hit the first and only time I went pking. Lol[/quote]
lol, i plan on doing that… but then raising attack and str to 60 attack and 80ish str.

Read full topic
item.source: Do you have a pure account?

item.title: Do you have a pure account?
item.dc:creator: @Nashiu Nashiu
item.description:
@Nashiu wrote:

Oh, in RS2 you can raise magic without raising 1 exp in hitpoints. I made a mage that was 67 magic with 10 hp and 1 everything else.
What you do is do the witch’s potion quest to get up a few lvls without raising hp, then you use confuse and that set of spells until you can low alch. Then you low alch until you can high alch. You can either do alchemy or teleporting, I used alchemy. I wouldn’t advise it though, I got 1hit the first and only time I went pking. Lol

Read full topic

item.source: Do you have a pure account?

item.title: Do you have a pure account?
item.dc:creator: @Nashiu Nashiu
item.description:
@Nashiu wrote:

I’m thinking of making a hybrid. Here’s the stats I’m thinking about.

40-70 attack
1 defense
99 strength
99 hitpoints
99 ranged
99 magic
1 prayer

Basically the only thing you raise combat from is attack, strength and hitpoints if you get those before all the other skills. If you’re 40 attack and 99 strength, you can get ranged to 99 without raising it. Magic can go as far as strength can as long as it doesn’t surpass it. Just keep prayer at 1 because the odds are you might not die too often. In member’s server get 60-70 attack for dragon weapons or that whip thing.

Read full topic
